import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

# Test the function

    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sphenomena\b', sentence)

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+System"
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group().replace(' the ', '').replace(' System', ''))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'].extend(physical_device_matches)

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'].extend(environment_object_matches)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+(?:database|card|disk|tap)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'].extend(external_system_matches)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"to\s+provide\s+the\s+military\s+services\s+with\s+a\s+single\s+command,\s+control,\s+data\s+receipt,\s+data\s+processing,\s+data\s+export\s+and\s+dissemination\s+system"
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"data"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'].extend(shared_phenomena_matches)

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "The purpose of the Tactical Control System is to provide the military services with a single command, control, data receipt, data processing, data export and dissemination system that is interoperable with the family of all present and future tactical unmanned aerial vehicles."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

import re
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk import pos_tag

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)
    
    # Identify the entity types
    tagged_tokens = pos_tag(tokens)
    
    # Initialize the entity types
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Extract entities
    for token, tag in tagged_tokens:
        if tag.startswith('NN') and token.lower() not in ['the', 'a', 'an']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
        elif tag.startswith('NN') and token.lower() in ['system', 'software']:
            entities['Software System'].append(token)
        elif tag.startswith('NN') and token.lower() in ['device', 'hardware']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
        elif tag.startswith('NN') and token.lower() in ['database', 'card', 'disk']:
            entities['External System'].append(token)
        elif tag.startswith('VB') and token.lower() in ['require', 'need']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
        elif tag.startswith('NN') and token.lower() in ['data', 'information']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)
    
    # Return the extracted entities
    return entities

        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Extract entities
    for token, tag in tagged_tokens:
        if tag.startswith('NN') and token.lower() not in ['the', 'a', 'an']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
        elif tag.startswith('NN') and token.lower() in ['system', 'software']:
            entities['Software System'].append(token)
        elif tag.startswith('NN') and token.lower() in ['device', 'hardware']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
        elif tag.startswith('NN') and token.lower() in ['database', 'card', 'disk']:
            entities['External System'].append(token)
        elif tag.startswith('VB') and token.lower() in ['require', 'need']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
        elif tag.startswith('NN') and token.lower() in ['data', 'information']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)
    
    # Return the extracted entities
    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(Software|System)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(Physical|Device)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(Environment|Object)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1].strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(External|System)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1].strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(System|Requirements)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(Shared|Phenomena)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match.strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match.strip())

    return json.dumps(entities)

import spacy

nlp = spacy.load("en_core_web_sm")

def extract_entities(input_string):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    doc = nlp(input_string)

        elif ent.label_ == "PERSON":
            entities['Environment Object'].append(ent.text)
        elif ent.label_ == "ORG":
            entities['External System'].append(ent.text)
        elif ent.label_ == "EVENT":
            entities['System Requirements'].append(ent.text)
        elif ent.label_ == "NORP":
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(ent.text)

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sUAV\b', sentence)
    physical_devices += re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema_definition = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'System Requirements': r'to support [A-Z][a-z]+ control in other centers',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'device control command|network identifier|username|password|plan|traffic signal plan identifier|traffic signal identifier|school zone identifier|dynamic lane identifier|HAR identifier|message|traffic data|device control information|connectivity|Command|Control|Communications|Computers'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema_definition.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema definition
    for entity_type, pattern in schema_definition.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System will also provide connectivity to specifically identified Command, Control, Communications, Computers, and "))

The function uses regular expressions to match the entities against the schema definition. The schema definition is a dictionary where the keys are the entity types and the values are the regular expression patterns to match the entities. The function initializes an empty list for each entity type in the result dictionary and then loops through each entity type in the schema definition. For each entity type, it uses the regular expression to find all matches in the sentence and adds the matches to the result dictionary. Finally, it converts the result dictionary to a JSON string and returns it.

The regular expression patterns used in the schema definition are:
- `Software System`: `\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b` matches a string that starts with a capital letter, followed by one or more lowercase letters, a space, another capital letter, one or more lowercase letters, and ends with the word "system".
- `Physical Device`: `\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device\b` matches a string that starts with a capital letter, followed by one or more lowercase letters, a space, another capital letter, one or more lowercase letters, and ends with the word "device".

import json

def extract_entities(sentence):

    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device

    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(Patient|Sun|Old|User|Team|Project|Co-I|Co-Is|ASP|ASPERA|VLA|VLA Expansion|Master Correlator|Correlator|Hardware|Monitor|Control|Computer|System|Interface|Network|Card|Disk|Strip|Tap|Bench|GUI|GUIs|GUI|GUI)\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(Tools|Software|System|Database|Card|Disk|Strip|Tap|Bench|GUI|GUIs|GUI|GUI|Monitor|Control|Computer|System|Interface|Network|Card|Disk|Strip|Tap|Bench|GUI|GUIs|GUI|GUI)\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(Requirements|Goals|Objectives|Mission|Tasking|Planning|Execution|Receipt|Processing|Exploitation|Dissemination|Access|Upgrade|Support|Control|Configuration|Control|Control)\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(Configuration|Control|Data|Information|Communication|Execution|Receipt|Processing|Exploitation|Dissemination|Access|Upgrade|Support|Control|Tasking|Planning|Mission|Goals|Objectives)\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:the)?\s*(\w+)\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+within\s+the"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"be\s+capable\s+of\s+(.*)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+status\s+signals"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sDevice\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sneeds\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sstatus\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))

```python
import re
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk import pos_tag

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)
    
    # Identify the entity types
    entity_types = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']
    
    # Initialize the extracted entities dictionary
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}
    
    # Extract entities for each entity type
    for token in tokens:
        # Check if the token is a software system
        if re.match(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', token):
            extracted_entities['Software System'].append(token)
        
        # Check if the token is a physical device
        elif re.match(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ device\b', token):
            extracted_entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
        
        # Check if the token is an environment object
        elif re.match(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ object\b', token):
            extracted_entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
        
        # Check if the token is an external system
        elif re.match(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ system\b', token):
            extracted_entities['External System'].append(token)
        
        # Check if the token is a system requirement
        elif re.match(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ requirement\b', token):
            extracted_entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
        
        # Check if the token is a shared phenomenon
        elif re.match(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ phenomenon\b', token):
            extracted_entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)
    
    # Return the extracted entities
    return extracted_entities
```

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema_definition = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema_definition.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for entity_type, pattern in schema_definition.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+|\w+)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s\w+|a\s\w+|\w+"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s\w+|a\s\w+|\w+"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+|\w+)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"To\s\w+|shall\s\w+|be\s\w+|can\s\w+|should\s\w+"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"\w+\s\w+|\w+"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+s\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+s\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+s\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+s\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

def extract_entities(sentence):

    }

    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(patient|sun|old)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard\ disk)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(better|data|integrity|error|handling|configuration|info|hardware)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(status|error|messages|configuration|info|hardware|data|security|breach)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group().replace(' the ', ' ').replace(' system', ''))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group().replace(' a ', ' ').replace(' ', ''))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group().replace(' the ', ' ').replace(' ', ''))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group().replace(' a ', ' ').replace(' ', ''))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"to\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+in\s+other\s+centers"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group().replace(' to ', ' ').replace(' in other centers', ''))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"device\s+control\s+command|network\s+identifier|username|password|traffic\s+data|device\s+control\s+information"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'].extend(shared_phenomena_match)

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))

import re
from typing import Dict

def extract_entities(sentence: str) -> Dict:
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Initialize the dictionary with empty lists for each entity type
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Extract entities for each type
    for token in tokens:
        if token in ['system', 'software']:
            entities['Software System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['device', 'hardware', 'processor']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
        elif token in ['environment', 'object']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
        elif token in ['system', 'database', 'card', 'disk']:
            entities['External System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['requirement', 'goal', 'objective']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
        elif token in ['signal', 'communication', 'data']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ unit\b|the [A-Z][a-z]+|a [A-Z][a-z]+'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\bthe [A-Z][a-z]+\b|a [A-Z][a-z]+'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|a [A-Z][a-z]+'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to be\b|to be able to|to support|shall be able to|should be able to'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ signals\b|status and error messages|device control command|network identifier|LCS identifier|DMS identifier|username|Password|wireless communications'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*in\sthe\s*real\s*world"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|an|the)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|a|the)\s*manually\s*designed\s*domain"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"to\s*support\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*in\s*meeting\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(2))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*data"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities

import re

        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*in\s*the\s*real\s*world"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|are\s*in|is\s*in)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|are\s*in|is\s*in)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"the\s*aim\s*and\s*purpose\s*of\s*the\s*system\s*to\s*be\s*developed"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append("")

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*and\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(2))

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b\s*shall\s*process\s*and\s*transfer\s*([A-Za-z\s]+)', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match.strip() for match in software_systems]

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b\s*shall\s*receive\s*([A-Za-z\s]+)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match.strip() for match in physical_devices]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b\s*will\s*aid\s*([A-Za-z\s]+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match.strip() for match in environment_objects]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b\s*shall\s*receive\s*configuration\s*information\s*from\s*([A-Za-z\s]+)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match.strip() for match in external_systems]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b\s*shall\s*([A-Za-z\s]+)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match.strip() for match in system_requirements]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Za-z\s]+', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match.strip() for match in shared_phenomena]

    return entities

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema and entity types
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Tokenize the input sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Initialize a dictionary to store the extracted entities
    entities = defaultdict(list)

    # Iterate over the tokens and identify the entity types
    for token in tokens:
        for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
            if re.match(pattern, token):
                entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a JSON string
    return {entity_type: entities[entity_type] for entity_type in entities}

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the entity types and their corresponding keywords
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': ['system', 'software', 'application', 'program'],
        'Physical Device': ['device', 'hardware', 'equipment', 'machine'],
        'Environment Object': ['object', 'entity', 'thing', 'phenomenon'],
        'External System': ['database', 'server', 'network', 'system'],
        'System Requirements': ['requirement', 'need', 'goal', 'objective'],
        'Shared Phenomena': ['event', 'state', 'value', 'phenomenon']
    }

    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}

    # Extract entities for each type
    for token in tokens:
        for entity_type, keywords in entity_types.items():
            if any(keyword in token for keyword in keywords):
                extracted_entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a dictionary
    return extracted_entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(CCTNS|Correlator Monitor and Control System|CMIB|Tactical Control System)\s+system\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(2))
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(All|the)\s+(computers|CMIB|writeable hardware control registers|Tactical Control System HWCIs|CSCIs)\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(2))
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|users)\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(maintenance and monitoring through remote logins|Year 2000 compliant|read back the contents of all writeable hardware control registers where meaningful|available to or on the EVLA Correlator Monitor and Control Systems that execute it|comply with Standard ISO 9241|developed on Open Standards|adopt standardized formats and common metadata elements)\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the contents)\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))
    
    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("All Tactical Control System HWCIs and CSCIs shall be Year 2000 compliant."))

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system|The [A-Z][a-z]+ system|A [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|an [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+|a [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+|an [A-Z][a-z]+|a [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system|the [A-Z][a-z]+ system|an [A-Z][a-z]+ system|a [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(to [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|to support [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|to provide [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|to exchange [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|to send and receive [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|to get/send/receive [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|to communicate with the [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|to execute on a [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|to transmit [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|to support [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|to provide access to the [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|data|information|signals|communications|control|command|identifier|username|Password|requests|data|information|events|states|values)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bAPAF\s?system\b|\bAPAF\s?ground\s?data\s?system\b|\bTactical\s?Control\s?System\b|\bCorrelator\s?Monitor\s?and\s?Control\s?System\b|\bVLA\s?Expansion\s?Project\s?Correlator\s?Monitor\s?and\s?Control\s?System\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\bdevice\b|\bhardware\b|\bcorrelator\b|\bphysical\s?correlator\s?hardware\s?configuration\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\bpersonnel\b|\busers\b|\boperators\b|\bIDFS\s?data\s?sets\b|\bpatient\b|\bthe\s?sun\b|\bthe\s?old\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\bVLA\s?Expansion\s?Project\s?Monitor\s?and\s?Control\s?System\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\brequirement\s?\b|\brequirements\s?\b|\bcharacteristic\s?\b|\bcriteria\s?\b|\bvalidation\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\bconfiguration\s?information\b|\bengineering\s?and\s?ancillary\s?information\b|\bIDFS\s?data\s?sets\b|\bthe\s?engineering\s?and\s?ancillary\s?information\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdevice\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\sobject\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\sSystem\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\srequirements\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\sphenomena\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [word for word in physical_device if word not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [word for word in environment_object if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [word for word in external_system if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [word for word in system_requirements if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object'] and word not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [word for word in shared_phenomena if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object'] and word not in entities['External System'] and word not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(DigitalHome|Correlator|Tactical|EVLA)\s+(Monitor|Control|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1] + ' ' + match[2] + ' ' + match[3])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(each|the)\s+(computer|system|watchdog)\s+timer\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1] + ' ' + match[2])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the)\s+(system|recovery)\s+mechanism\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1] + ' ' + match[2])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(shall|must|can|will)\s+(recover|transfer|process|monitor|continue|reboot|startup|operation|shutdown)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(dynamic|system|configuration|default|parameter|settings|planning|usage|data)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match)

    return entities

# Test the function

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s+system\b'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append('The system')

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(power|digital programmable)\s+switch(es)?\b'
    physical_device_pattern2 = r'\b(a|an)\s+(coffee|hot-swapped)\s+maker\b'
    physical_device_pattern3 = r'\b(power|digital programmable)\s+switch(es)?\b'
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence) or re.search(physical_device_pattern2, sentence) or re.search(physical_device_pattern3, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append('a power switch')
        entities['Physical Device'].append('the power switch')

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(user|patient|sun|old)\b'
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'].append('a user')

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(appliance|database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b'
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['External System'].append('an appliance')

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(change|recovery|setting|establishing|starting|stopping|monitoring)\b'
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'].append('change the state of the appliance')

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(state|configuration|time period)\b'
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('the state')

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ subsystem?)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device?)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system?)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ from [a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([a-z]+ and [a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+)\s+device"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+)\s+database"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+(\w+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+shall\s+remain\s+in\s+that\s+state"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+ system|the [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'The [A-Z][a-z]+ requestor|a [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'a [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'the [A-Z][a-z]+ Expansion Project Monitor and Control System|the existing systems'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'To support [A-Z][a-z]+ control in other centers|the development of the [A-Z][a-z]+ system'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'information for command timeframe request|network identifier|device type|days commands accepted|times commands accepted|configuration information|a physical correlator hardware configuration|device control command|username|Password|startup of HWCIs|download of software|startup of CSCIs|execution of Startup FD/L|establishment of the state of readiness of all interfaces'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System

    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(hot-swapped|all|the|a)\s+hardware\s+devices\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a)\s+(sun|patient|old|current|operational|system|recovery|mechanism|queue|parameter|configuration|control|event|communication|internet|power|loss|software|hardware|failure|backup)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(recovery|download|startup|establishment|restoration|support|maintenance|control|configuration|parameter|settings|planning|usage|data|processing|interconnect|hardware|repair|replacement|reconfiguration|accessibility|readiness|state)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(configuration|control|event|communication|parameter|settings|planning|usage|data|processing|interconnect|hardware|repair|replacement|reconfiguration|accessibility|readiness|state)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_match

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_match

    return entities

import nltk
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk import pos_tag

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)
    
    # Identify the entity types
    entity_types = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']
    
    # Initialize the extracted entities dictionary
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}
    
    # Extract entities for each type
    for token in tokens:
        # Check if the token is a noun
        if pos_tag([token])[0][1] in ['NN', 'NNS', 'NNP', 'NNPS']:
            # Check if the token is a software system
            if token.lower() in ['system', 'software']:
                extracted_entities['Software System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a physical device
            elif token.lower() in ['device', 'computer', 'hardware']:
                extracted_entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an environment object
            elif token.lower() in ['operator', 'user', 'patient']:
                extracted_entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an external system
            elif token.lower() in ['database', 'card', 'disk']:
                extracted_entities['External System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a system requirement
            elif token.lower() in ['requirement', 'need', 'goal']:
                extracted_entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a shared phenomenon
            elif token.lower() in ['event', 'state', 'value']:
                extracted_entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)
    
    # Return the extracted entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\bThe\s\w+\shardware\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [item for item in physical_device if item not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [item for item in environment_object if item not in entities['Software System'] and item not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [item for item in external_system if item not in entities['Software System'] and item not in entities['Physical Device'] and item not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [item for item in system_requirements if item not in entities['Software System'] and item not in entities['Physical Device'] and item not in entities['Environment Object'] and item not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [item for item in shared_phenomena if item not in entities['Software System'] and item not in entities['Physical Device'] and item not in entities['Environment Object'] and item not in entities['External System'] and item not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(System|system)\s*(shall|Shall|is|Is|be|Be|have|Have|can|Can|will|Will|must|Must|may|May)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(and|And)?'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(computer|Computer|device|Device|equipment|Equipment|machine|Machine|system|System|hardware|Hardware)\s*(with|With|and|And)?'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(in|In|on|On|of|Of|with|With|and|And)?'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(database|Database|card|Card|disk|Disk|system|System|network|Network)\s*(with|With|and|And)?'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|Shall|is|Is|be|Be|have|Have|can|Can|will|Will|must|Must|may|May)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(and|And)?'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[2])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(data|Data|information|Information|messages|Messages|events|Events|states|States|values|Values)\s*(with|With|and|And)?'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1])

    return entities

    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result = json.dumps(result)

    return result

```python
import re
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)

    # Define the entity types
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': re.compile(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(APA|EV|Center|System)\s+(to|of|in|on)\s+(Center|System)\b'),
        'Physical Device': re.compile(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(correlator|device|system)\b'),
        'Environment Object': re.compile(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(user|patient|sun|old)\b'),
        'External System': re.compile(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|card|tap|disk)\b'),
        'System Requirements': re.compile(r'\b(normal|smooth|unrestricted|allowable)\b'),
        'Shared Phenomena': re.compile(r'\b(mode|operations|activities|engagement|learning|experience)\b')
    }

    # Extract entities
    extracted_entities = {}
    for entity_type, pattern in entity_types.items():
        extracted_entities[entity_type] = [token for token in tokens if pattern.match(token)]

    # Return the extracted entities
    return extracted_entities

# Test the function

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\w+|[^\w\s]', sentence)

    # Define the entity types
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Extract entities for each type
    for token in tokens:
        if token.lower() in ['system', 'software', 'computer', 'hardware', 'device']:
            entity_types['Software System'].append(token)
        elif token.lower() in ['device', 'machine', 'equipment', 'instrument']:
            entity_types['Physical Device'].append(token)
        elif token.lower() in ['patient', 'sun', 'old', 'environment']:
            entity_types['Environment Object'].append(token)
        elif token.lower() in ['database', 'card', 'disk', 'system']:
            entity_types['External System'].append(token)
        elif token.lower() in ['requirement', 'need', 'purpose']:
            entity_types['System Requirements'].append(token)
        elif token.lower() in ['event', 'state', 'value']:
            entity_types['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities
    return entity_types

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:Master|Correlator|Tactical|CCTNS)\s+Control\s+System"
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append(re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:Network|computer|data link|hardware|Correlator|Master|Tactical|CCTNS)\s+routers/switches|workstation|interface|terminal|processors"
    physical_devices = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'].extend(physical_devices)

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:patient|sun|old|correlator)"
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'].append(re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence).group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|COTS operating system|Virtual Correlator Interface|CMIB operating system)"
    external_systems = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'].extend(external_systems)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(?:to\s+protect|continue|provide|support|access|upgrade|transfer|monitor)"
    system_requirements = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'].extend(system_requirements)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:redundant communication path|external hardware status signals|dynamic control data)"
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'].extend(shared_phenomena)

    return entities

# Test the function

## Code
```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sMonitor\sand\sControl\sSystem\b'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append(re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\bCorrelator\sPower\sControl\sComputer\b|\bthe\sMaster\sCorrelator\sControl\sComputer\b'
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append(re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\bWatchdog\sprocesses\b'
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'].append(re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence).group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\bconduct\smission\scontrol\sand\smonitoring\b|\bsetting\sup\sand\smaintaining\sconfiguration\b|\bmonitor\s\w+\shealth\b|\brecover\sfrom\s\w+\sand\scomputing\s\w+\sfaults\b'
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'].append(re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\bstatus\sand\serror\smessages\b|\bCorrelator\sPower\sControl\sComputer\shealth\b|\bthe\sconfiguration\b'
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence).group())

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "The Tactical Control System will allow the operator to conduct mission control and monitoring."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```
