```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|an)\s+(Center|Control|Monitor|Correlator|DigitalHome|Tactical|C-2-C|LCS)\s+(System|GUI|Unit|Monitor|Control|System|Interface)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(A|an)\s+(thermostat|master|humidistats|correlator)\s+(unit|control|system|interface)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(A|an)\s+(patient|sun|old|DigitalHome|LCS|operator|center|control|system|interface|technician)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|an)\s+(C-2-C|LCS|DigitalHome|database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(To|shall|will)\s+(support|allow|execute|process|transfer|monitor|set|maintain|operate|configure|service)\s+(.*)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[2] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(status|error|equipment|dynamic|control|data|network|identifier|username|password|wireless|signals|interface|command)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b|\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b|\b\w+\scomputer\b|\b\w+\scontroller\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sobject\b|\b\w+\sentity\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\ssystem\b|\b\w+\sdatabase\b|\b\w+\srepository\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b|\b\w+\sfunctionality\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sdata\b|\b\w+\smessage\b|\b\w+\svalue\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {'Software System': [], 'Physical Device': [], 'Environment Object': [], 'External System': [], 'System Requirements': [], 'Shared Phenomena': []}
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|receive|process|translate|provide|accept)\s+the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(2))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|receive|process|translate|provide|accept)\s+the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s+hardware"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(2))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|receive|process|translate|provide|accept)\s+the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(2))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|receive|process|translate|provide|accept)\s+configuration\s+information\s+from\s+(\w+\s*\w*)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(2))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|receive|process|translate|provide|accept)\s+to\s+(be|have|receive|process|translate|provide|accept)\s+(\w+\s*\w*)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(3))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|receive|process|translate|provide|accept)\s+(\w+\s*\w*)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(2))

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\bthe\s\w+\sComputer\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\bthe\s\w+\s\b',
        'External System': r'\bthe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

The function uses regular expressions to match the entities against the schema definition. The schema is defined as a dictionary where each key is an entity type and the value is a regular expression pattern. The function loops through each entity type, uses the regular expression to find all matches, and adds the matches to the result dictionary. Finally, the function converts the result dictionary to a JSON string and returns it.

The regular expressions used in the schema are:
- `Software System`: `\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b` matches the string "The" followed by one or more word characters, followed by "System".
- `Physical Device`: `\bthe\s\w+\sComputer\b` matches the string "the" followed by one or more word characters, followed by "Computer".
- `Environment Object`: `\bthe\s\w+\s\b` matches the string "the" followed by one or more word characters, followed by a space.
- `External System`: `\bthe\s\w+\sSystem\b` matches the string "the" followed by one or more word characters, followed by "System".
- `System Requirements`: `\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b` matches three word characters separated by spaces.
- `Shared Phenomena`: `\b\w+\s\w+\b` matches two word characters separated by a space.

The regular expressions are case-sensitive and match the exact string. The `\b` at the beginning and end of the pattern matches a word boundary, ensuring that the pattern matches a whole word. The `\s` matches a space character. The `\w` matches a word character (alphanumeric plus underscore). The `+` after `\w` matches one or more of the preceding element. The `json.dumps` function converts the result dictionary to a JSON string. The `print` function is used to print the result.

def extract_entities(sentence):

    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sdevice\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\bTo\s\w+\scontrol\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\scontrol\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Object\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Requirements\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Phenomena\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "Tactical Control System shall provide the capability for the operator to retrieve a mission plan for viewing, modification, as well as deletion at the operator's discretion, and allow the operator to save the mission plan under a different name, for future retrieval."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sdevice\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\bthe\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\bthe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\bshall\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sconstraints\b', sentence)
    shared_phenomena += re.findall(r'\b\w+\sdata\b', sentence)
    shared_phenomena += re.findall(r'\b\w+\splan\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function

import re

def extract_entities(input_string):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bAPAF\b|\bThe\b\s+ground\s+data\s+system\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, input_string)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\bThe\s+Master\s+Correlator\s+Control\s+Computer\b|\bthe\s+correlator\s+hardware\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, input_string)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\bthe\s+sun\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, input_string)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\bthe\s+VLA\s+Expansion\s+Project\s+Monitor\s+and\s+Control\s+System\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, input_string)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\bthe\s+weight\s+and\s+balance\s+data\s+for\s+takeoff\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, input_string)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\bmodels\b|\btimes\s+standards\b|\bfiber-link\s+phase\s+corrections\b|\bcontrol\s+data\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, input_string)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],

        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+System\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+device\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+data\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+database\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+calculations\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+inputs\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    software_systems = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ (temperature|humidity|contact sensor|power state)\b'
    physical_devices = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ (the [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+s)\b'
    environment_objects = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ (database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b'
    external_systems = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ (shall have a minimum data acquisition rate of|shall be calibrated and validated prior to|calculate the minimum data link reception altitude for|transfer|monitor)\b'
    system_requirements = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ (data|information|message sets|ASPERA-3 data|dynamic control data|data link reception altitude|line-of-sight flights)\b'
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bthe\s+Center\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[a-zA-Z]+[a-zA-Z\s]*[a-zA-Z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-zA-Z]+[a-zA-Z\s]*[a-zA-Z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[a-zA-Z]+[a-zA-Z\s]*[a-zA-Z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'To\s+support\s+[a-zA-Z]+[a-zA-Z\s]*[a-zA-Z]+',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'device\s+control\s+command|network\s+identifier|username|password|plan|duration|reversible\s+lane\s+identifier|ramp\s+meter\s+identifier|LCS\s+identifier|traffic\s+signal\s+identifier|school\s+zone\s+identifier|dynamic\s+lane\s+identifier|lane\s+plan|traffic\s+signal\s+plan\s+identifier|password|username|displaying\s+the\s+following'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*equipment"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*personnel"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+have|shall\s+be|shall\s+analyze|shall\s+process|shall\s+transfer|shall\s+receive|shall\s+translate|should\s+be|should\s+have|should\s+analyze|should\s+process|should\s+transfer|should\s+receive|should\s+translate"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*data"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities

import nltk
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk import pos_tag

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)
    
    # Identify the entity types
    entity_types = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']
    
    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}
    
    # Extract entities for each type
    for token in tokens:
        if token in entity_types:
            extracted_entities[token].append(token)
        elif token.lower() in ['the', 'a', 'an']:
            continue
        else:
            # Check if the token is a noun
            pos = pos_tag([token])[0][1]
            if pos in ['NN', 'NNS', 'NNP', 'NNPS']:
                # Check if the token is a software system
                if token.lower() in ['system', 'software']:
                    extracted_entities['Software System'].append(token)
                # Check if the token is a physical device
                elif token.lower() in ['device', 'hardware']:
                    extracted_entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
                # Check if the token is an environment object
                elif token.lower() in ['object', 'environment']:

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"shall\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+support\s+the\s+following\s+device\s+control\s+command\s+for\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+and\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(2))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"each\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"To\s+support\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+control\s+in\s+other\s+centers"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"including\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        shared_phenomena_list = shared_phenomena_match.group(1).split(', ')
        for phenomenon in shared_phenomena_list:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(phenomenon)

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b|\b\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\bTo\s\w+\scontrol\b|\bTo\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\scontrol\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Center|System|Correlator Monitor and Control System|Tactical Control System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(interface|device|tap|hard disk|magnetic stripe card|database|card|stripe|disk|interface|device|tap|hard disk|magnetic stripe card|database)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old|interfaces|waypoint|lane|HAR|Reversible Lane|Dynamic Lane|Traffic Signal|LCS|DMS)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(existing system|database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|DMS|LCS|HAR|Traffic Signal|Dynamic Lane|Reversible Lane)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(to|support)\s+(.*)\s+(control|display|transfer|process)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(network|username|password|plan|duration|message|identifier|control|command|data|monitor|waypoint|lane|HAR|Reversible Lane|Dynamic Lane|Traffic Signal|LCS|DMS)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = list(set(shared_phenomena_matches))

    return entities

def extract_entities(sentence):

        'Software System': [],

        entities['Physical Device'].append(device[1])

    # Environment Object

    for object in environment_objects:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(object[1])

    # External System

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Software|System|Center|Monitor|Control|Tactical|AV|HAR|Traffic Signal|Dynamic Lane|Reversible Lane|CCTV|DMS)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(Device|Traffic Signal|Dynamic Lane|Reversible Lane|CCTV|DMS|HAR|AV)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(user|patient|sun|old|AV|HAR|Traffic Signal|Dynamic Lane|Reversible Lane|CCTV|DMS)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(to|support|control|display|issue|select|provide|receive|send|get|channel|switch|switching|command|control|command|identifier|username|password|message|plan|duration|footprint|view|field|downlink)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(status|error|messages|icon|indicating|payload|center|field|of|view|footprint|downlink|network|identifier|username|password|message|plan|duration|traffic|signal|identifier|plan|identifier|duration|reversible|lane|identifier|plan|identifier|duration|cctv|switching|command|source|destination|port|input|output|device|control|command|identifier|username|password|message|plan|duration|har|identifier|username|password|message|plan|duration|dynamic|lane|identifier|plan|identifier|duration)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over each entity type in the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {

        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(device)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[0])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(system)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[0])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(shall|can|must)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match)

    return entities

    }

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"The\s*(\w+)\s*System"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s*(\w+)\s*hardware"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s*(\w+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+)\s*Expansion\s*Project\s*Monitor\s*and\s*Control\s*System"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"to\s*(\w+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+)\s*formats"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\sDevice\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\sObject\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\sSystem\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\srequirements\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\sphenomena\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

## Step 1: Define the entity extraction rules
To extract entities from the given sentence, we need to define the rules for each entity type. 
- Software System: any noun phrase that refers to a system or software.
- Physical Device: any noun phrase that refers to a device in the real world.
- Environment Object: any noun phrase that refers to an entity in the real world.
- External System: any noun phrase that refers to a manually designed domain that can store data messages.
- System Requirements: any verb phrase that describes the aim and purpose of the system to be developed.
- Shared Phenomena: any noun phrase that refers to a set of shared events, states, and values between connected entities.

## Step 2: Tokenize the input sentence
We need to tokenize the input sentence into individual words or tokens.

## Step 3: Apply the entity extraction rules
We need to apply the entity extraction rules to each token in the sentence to identify the entities.

## Step 4: Group the entities by type
We need to group the extracted entities by their type (Software System, Physical Device, Environment Object, External System, System Requirements, Shared Phenomena).

```python
import re
from collections import defaultdict

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the entity extraction rules
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ device\b'
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ entity\b'
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ system\b'
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ data\b'

    # Tokenize the input sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Apply the entity extraction rules
    software_systems = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    physical_devices = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    environment_objects = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    external_systems = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    system_requirements = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)

    # Group the entities by type
    entities = defaultdict(list)
    entities['Software System'].extend(software_systems)
    entities['Physical Device'].extend(physical_devices)
    entities['Environment Object'].extend(environment_objects)
    entities['External System'].extend(external_systems)
    entities['System Requirements'].extend(system_requirements)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'].extend(shared_phenomena)

    # Return the extracted entities as a JSON string
    return {'Software System': entities['Software System'],
            'Physical Device': entities['Physical Device'],
            'Environment Object': entities['Environment Object'],
            'External System': entities['External System'],
            'System Requirements': entities['System Requirements'],
            'Shared Phenomena': entities['Shared Phenomena']}

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema_definition = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b|\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sAVs\b|\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sCo-Is\b|\b\w+\speople\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\sdatabase\b|\b\w+\ssystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\sfunctionality\b|\b\w+\srequirements\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sstate\b|\b\w+\svalue\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema_definition.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for entity_type, pattern in schema_definition.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))

    # Environment Object

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+s?\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+s?\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+s?\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+System'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group().replace(' System', ''))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'an\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'Software'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'To\s+support\s+[A-Z][a-z]+(?:\s+control)?\s+in\s+other\s+centers'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'device\s+control\s+command|network\s+identifier|username|password|message|traffic\s+signal\s+identifier|traffic\s+signal\s+plan\s+identifier|LCS\s+identifier|security\s+breach|Identification\s+Friend\s+or\s+Foe'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'].extend(shared_phenomena_match)

    return {key: value for key, value in entities.items() if value}

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System shall provide the capability to fully control and display the AV's Identification Friend or Foe"))
```

            extracted_entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
        # Check if the token is an environment object
        elif re.match(r'\b[a-z]+\b', token):
            extracted_entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
        # Check if the token is an external system
        elif re.match(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b', token):
            extracted_entities['External System'].append(token)
        # Check if the token is a system requirement
        elif re.match(r'\b[to be able to]\b', token):
            extracted_entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
        # Check if the token is a shared phenomenon
        elif re.match(r'\b[a-z]+\b', token):
            extracted_entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)
    
    # Return the extracted entities
    return extracted_entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s+(?:Correlator\s+)?Monitor\s+and\s+Control\s+System\b'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
        entities['Software System'].append('The Correlator Monitor and Control System')

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\bAV\b'
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
        entities['Physical Device'].append('the AV')

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\busers\b'
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
        entities['Environment Object'].append('users')

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\boperation\s+of\s+the\s+AV\s+via\s+all\s+flight\s+modes\b'
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
        entities['System Requirements'].append('operation of the AV via all flight modes')

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\bmanual\s+controls\b'
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('manual controls')

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):

        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ signals)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-z]+ requirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ phenomenon\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'the\s+(?:Center|Correlator Monitor and Control System|VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System)'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema_definition = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ unit\b|the [a-z]+',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+',
        'External System': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ card\b|a [a-z]+',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+ in [A-Z][a-z]+ centers\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ signals\b|status and error messages|data link communication|wireless signals|dynamic control data|device control command|traffic signal plan identifier|network identifier|traffic signal identifier|username|password|traffic signal|light and sound alarms|light alarm subsystem|multiple lights|transmitter signal strength|frequencies used by ADT'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema_definition.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for entity_type, pattern in schema_definition.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(controller|sensor|alarm|switch|card|disk|stripe|tap|contact)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(patient|sun|old)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(database|magnetic|stripe|card|disk|tap|hard)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+have\s+([a-zA-Z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(and|or|with|from)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema and entity types
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bSoftware System\b|\bSystem\b|\bSystem\s+shall\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\bdevice\b|\bdevice\s+shall\b|\bcontact\b|\bswitch\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\bpatient\b|\bdoor\b|\bwindow\b|\buser\b',
        'External System': r'\bdatabase\b|\bcard\b|\bstripe\b|\bhard\sdisk\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\bshall\b|\bshall\s+be\b|\bshall\s+include\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\bstatus\b|\berror\b|\bmessage\b|\bdata\b'
    }

    # Tokenize the input sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = defaultdict(list)

    # Iterate over the tokens and identify the entity types
    for token in tokens:
        for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
            if re.search(pattern, token):
                result[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps({k: v for k, v in result.items() if v})

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+)?(\w+(?:\s+\w+)*)\s+System"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:\w+\s+)?(\w+(?:\s+\w+)*)\s+(?:device|system|computer|hardware|watchdog|timer)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:\w+\s+)?(\w+(?:\s+\w+)*)\s+(?:patient|sun|old)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:\w+\s+)?(\w+(?:\s+\w+)*)\s+(?:database|card|tap|disk)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(?:shall|will)\s+(?:be|have|provide|monitor|detect|notify|recover|transfer|process)\s+(?:the|a)\s+(?:\w+\s+)?(\w+(?:\s+\w+)*)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:status|error|deviation|configuration|mission|plan|flight|path|info|hardware|timer)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0).strip())

    return entities

from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)

    # Define the entity types
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': re.compile(r'\b\w+\s\w+\sSystem\b'),
        'Physical Device': re.compile(r'\b\w+\sdevice\b'),
        'Environment Object': re.compile(r'\b\w+\sobject\b'),
        'External System': re.compile(r'\b\w+\sSystem\b'),
        'System Requirements': re.compile(r'\b\w+\srequirement\b'),
        'Shared Phenomena': re.compile(r'\b\w+\sphenomenon\b')
    }

    # Extract entities
    entities = {}
    for entity_type, pattern in entity_types.items():
        entities[entity_type] = [token for token in tokens if pattern.match(token)]

    return entities

```python
import re
from collections import defaultdict

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema and entity types
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ System\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ requirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ phenomenon\b'
    }

    # Tokenize the input sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = defaultdict(list)

    # Iterate over the schema and entity types
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Find all matches for the current entity type
        matches = [token for token in tokens if re.match(pattern, token)]
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type].extend(matches)

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return {k: v for k, v in result.items() if v}

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)\s+system"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+)\s+device"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+)\s+database"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"to\s+(.*)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+and\s+(\w+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

This code defines a function `extract_entities` that takes a sentence as input and returns a dictionary with the extracted entities. The function uses regular expressions to match the patterns of the different entity types. The regular expressions are defined as follows:

*   `software_system_pattern`: matches the phrase "the <system_name> system"
*   `physical_device_pattern`: matches the phrase "a <device_name> device"
*   `environment_object_pattern`: matches the phrase "the <object_name>"
*   `external_system_pattern`: matches the phrase "a <database_name> database"
*   `system_requirements_pattern`: matches the phrase "to <requirement>"
*   `shared_phenomena_pattern`: matches the phrase "<phenomenon1> and <phenomenon2>"

The function uses the `re.findall` method to find all matches of the patterns in the sentence. The matches are then added to the corresponding list in the `entities` dictionary.

The code also includes a test case at the end to demonstrate the function's usage.

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities['Software System']]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']]
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device'] and system not in entities['Environment Object']]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']]
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']]
    
    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+\s\w+)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+|the\s\w+)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+|these\s\w+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+|the\s\w+|a\s\w+)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+|to\s\w+|for\s\w+|in\s\w+|with\s\w+|using\s\w+|via\s\w+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+|a\s\w+|the\s\w+|of\s\w+|in\s\w+|with\s\w+|using\s\w+|via\s\w+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Center|System|Correlator|Master|Control|Computer|Unit|Device|Home|DigitalHome|Traffic Signal|Reversible Lane)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Master|Correlator|Power|Control|Computer|Unit|Device|Humidistats|Air Vehicle|Thermostat|Signal|Lane)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old|unit|content|signal|lane)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Master|Correlator|Control|Computer|Hardware|Device|Status|Requestor|Center)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(ASPERA|Array|Patient|Sun|Old|Interfaces|Team|Co-I|Correlator|Device|Status|Requestor|Center)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Database|Magnetic|Stripe|Card|Tap|Hard|Disk|System)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(to|for|in|with|so|that|as|long|as|the|transmission|processing|are|error-free|support|meeting|mission|goals|objectives)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(payload|data|information|command|timeframe|request|network|identifier|device|type|days|commands|accepted|times|accepted|status|telemetry|IDFS|data|transmission|processing|error-free|meeting|mission|goals|objectives)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

    if physical_device:
        entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\bthe\s\w+\b', sentence)
    if environment_object:
        entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\bThis\s\w+\b', sentence)
    if external_system:
        entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\bshall\s\w+\b', sentence)
    if system_requirements:
        entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    if shared_phenomena:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+ to [a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities
