```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'the\s+(?:Center|Correlator Monitor and Control System|Master Correlator Control Computer-VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System|Master Correlator Control Computer-CMIB|Master Correlator Control Computer-Correlator Power Control Computer|The Correlator Monitor and Control System)'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append('the Center')

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(?:The Master Correlator Control Computer-CMIB|Master Correlator Control Computer-Correlator Power Control Computer)'
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append('The Master Correlator Control Computer-CMIB')
        entities['Physical Device'].append('Master Correlator Control Computer-Correlator Power Control Computer')

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(?:a Traffic Signal|a DMS|a Reversible Lane|a LCS|a School Zone)'
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'].append('a Traffic Signal')
        entities['Environment Object'].append('a DMS')
        entities['Environment Object'].append('a Reversible Lane')
        entities['Environment Object'].append('a LCS')
        entities['Environment Object'].append('a School Zone')

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(?:a DMS|Master Correlator Control Computer-CMIB|Master Correlator Control Computer-Correlator Power Control Computer)'
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['External System'].append('a DMS')
        entities['External System'].append('Master Correlator Control Computer-CMIB')
        entities['External System'].append('Master Correlator Control Computer-Correlator Power Control Computer')

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'To\s+support\s+(?:Traffic Signal|DMS|Reversible Lane|LCS|School Zone|Data terminal) control in other centers'
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'].append('To support Traffic Signal control in other centers')
        entities['System Requirements'].append('To support DMS control in other centers')
        entities['System Requirements'].append('To support Reversible Lane control in other centers')
        entities['System Requirements'].append('To support LCS control in other centers')
        entities['System Requirements'].append('To support School Zone control in other centers')
        entities['System Requirements'].append('Data terminal control')

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(?:device control command|network identifier|traffic signal identifier|username|password|traffic signal plan identifier|antenna pointing control|transmitter control|receiver control|plan|duration|dynamic control data|monitor data)'
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('device control command')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('network identifier')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('traffic signal identifier')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('username')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('password')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('traffic signal plan identifier')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('antenna pointing control')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('transmitter control')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('receiver control')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('plan')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('duration')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('dynamic control data')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('monitor data')

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*(\w+)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall\s*(use|send|receive|get|through))\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[2])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall\s*(be|contain|have|include))\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[2])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall\s*(contain|have|include))\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[2])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall\s*(support|have|include|provide))\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[2])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall\s*(send|receive|use|get|through))\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[2])

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:Center|Gateway|DigitalHome system|Monitor and Control System|remote Center Control GUI|Tactical Control System|an Center)"
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'] = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:The|a)\s+(?:Gateway|RF Module|master control unit|humidistats|SATellite COMmunication (SATCOM) antenna|an RF Module|sensors|controllers|the AV|the user|a Traffic Signal|a HAR|a LCS)"
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'] = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:patient|sun|old|public network)"
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'] = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|C-2-C software system)"
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['External System'] = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"To\s+support\s+([A-Z][a-z]+)\s+control\s+in\s+other\s+centers"
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'] = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:device|network|traffic|wireless|status|error|equipment|SATCOM|LOS|LOS\s+is\s+obstructed)"
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'] = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+s?\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [obj for obj in environment_object if obj not in physical_device]

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+s?\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [sys for sys in external_system if sys not in physical_device]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ for [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+s?\b', sentence)
    shared_phenomena += re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in physical_device and phenomenon not in external_system]

    return entities
```

```python
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+|the [a-z]+|an [a-z]+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+|the [a-z]+|an [a-z]+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+|the [a-z]+|an [a-z]+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to be able to|in order to|shall be capable of|shall have to|shall use|shall contain|shall send and receive|shall communicate\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[LOS|SATCOM|wireless signals|status and error messages|information about network device status|network identifier|number of DMSs|number of LCSs|DMS status data|LCS status data|CCTV status data|device control command|username|Password|LOS|SATCOM|wireless communications|wireless signals|status and error messages|information about network device status|network identifier|number of DMSs|number of LCSs|DMS status data|LCS status data|CCTV status data|device control command|username|Password]\b'

    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+\s\w+)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+|an\s\w+|the\s\w+)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+|a\s\w+|the\s\w+)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+|to\s\w+|for\s\w+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s\w+|the\s\w+|an\s\w+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ Device)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(shall|must|should|can) (process|transfer|monitor|receive|translate|present|support|communicate|get|send|receive|store|update|delete|insert|modify|read|write) ([A-Za-z\s]+)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(2))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z\s]+)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities
```

def extract_entities(sentence):

```python
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"shall\s+(be|have|allow|use|provide|support|require)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+device"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"shall\s+(be|have|allow|use|provide|support|require)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+object"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1].strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(be|have|allow|use|provide|support|require)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+system"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1].strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+(be|have|allow|use|provide|support|require)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"shall\s+(be|have|allow|use|provide|support|require)\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+signals"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1].strip())

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b|\b\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
    entities = {

        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],

    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk import pos_tag

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)
    
    # Identify the entity types
    entity_types = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']
    
    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}
    
    # Extract entities for each type
    for token in tokens:
        # Check if the token is a noun
        if pos_tag([token])[0][1] in ['NN', 'NNS', 'NNP', 'NNPS']:
            # Check if the token is a software system
            if re.match(r'\w+ System', token):
                extracted_entities['Software System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a physical device
            elif re.match(r'\w+ Device', token):
                extracted_entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an environment object
            elif re.match(r'\w+ Object', token):
                extracted_entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is an external system
            elif re.match(r'\w+ System', token):
                extracted_entities['External System'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a system requirement
            elif re.match(r'\w+ Requirement', token):
                extracted_entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
            # Check if the token is a shared phenomenon
            elif re.match(r'\w+ Phenomenon', token):
                extracted_entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)
    
    # Return the extracted entities
    return extracted_entities

# Test the function
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|an)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(The|A|an)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(device)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(The|A|an)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|an)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(database|card|disk|tap|stripe|system)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(shall|can|must|should|will)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(\w+\s*\w*)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match)

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "The Tactical Control System operator shall be able to select the content of the overlay information."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(The|A|an)\s+(Center|System|Tactical Control System)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(Traffic Signal|LCS|HAR|DMS)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(the|a)\s+(user|map|target|patient|sun|old|LCS|HAR|DMS|Traffic Signal)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(To support|shall have the capability)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(Target|Message|Beacons|device control command|network identifier|username|password|traffic signal plan identifier|Assignment of lane arrows|status and error messages|message|ICON|displaying the following)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema definition
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find the entities
        entities = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the entities to the result dictionary
        result[key] = entities

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|an [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(The|the) (device|Device) (status|Status) (requestor|Requestor)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(the|The) (user|User)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(APAF|ASPERA-3|MEX OA|the existing system)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(To support|to support) (video snapshots|meeting MEX mission goals and objectives)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(RS170A video and digital imagery|ASPERA-3 and MEX OA cleaned-up telemetry|ASPERA-3 and MEX OA telemetry|status and error messages|The data|information for command timeframe request|network identifier|device type|days commands accepted|times commands accepted|CCTV identifier|CCTV name|status|ASPERA-3 IDFS data|ASPERA-3 telemetry)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "RS170A video and digital imagery shall be routed to Tactical Control System functions and displayed upon operator request."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

import re
```python
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\bthe\s\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\bthe\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\sdata\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],

        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System

    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(the|a) ([A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(shall|can|must|will|have|be|is|are|am|are|is|has|have|had|do|does|did|will|would|shall|should|may|might|must|ought|shall|should|can|could|may|might|must|ought)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|the|a|and|or|but|for|nor|so|yet|not|no|none|nothing|nowhere|then|when|where|whether|why|how|what|which|this|that|these|those|there|here|therefore|in|into|upon|under|between|among|within|against|by|with|from|of|on|at|to|a|an|the|and|or|but|for|nor|so|yet|not|no|none|nothing|nowhere|then|when|where|whether|why|how|what|which|this|that|these|those|there|here|therefore|in|into|upon|under|between|among|within|against|by|with|from|of|on|at|to)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(Center|System|Monitor|Control|Tactical Control|LCS|HAR|DMS|Traffic Signal|Device Status Requestor)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(Traffic Signal|Device Status Requestor|DMS|LCS|HAR)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(user|operator|payload field-of-view center|sun|old|patient)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|Monitor and Control System)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'To\s+support\s+(LCS|HAR|Traffic Signal|device control|command timeframe request)\s+in\s+other\s+centers'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[0])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(target location function|device control command|network identifier|traffic signal identifier|username|password|traffic signal plan identifier|information for command timeframe request|days commands accepted|times commands accepted|message|status and error messages|message|device type|beacons on/off|target traffic signal and plan)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match)

    return entities
```

```python
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(2).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|support|receive|translate|display|control|select|provide)\s+the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(2).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|support|receive|translate|display|control|select|provide)\s+the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+System"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"To\s+support\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+control\s+in\s+other\s+centers"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"shall\s+(have|be|support|receive|translate|display|control|select|provide)\s+the\s+following\s+([A-Za-z\s,]+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(2).strip())

    return entities
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"The\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall"
    match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Software System'].append(match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*hardware"
    match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*products|(\w+\s*\w*)\s*coordinates"
    match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match.group(1).strip())
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match.group(2).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*Monitor\s*and\s*Control\s*System"
    match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'
    software_systems = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+|the [a-z]+|an [a-z]+|a [a-z]+\b'
    physical_devices = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+|the [a-z]+|an [a-z]+|a [a-z]+\b'
    environment_objects = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+|the [a-z]+|an [a-z]+|a [a-z]+\b'
    external_systems = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to [a-z]+|be able to [a-z]+|have the ability to [a-z]+\b'
    system_requirements = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+|the [a-z]+|an [a-z]+|a [a-z]+\b'
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function

```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(system|layer|system\s+layers)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[0] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(hardware|computer|device|system)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[0] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(user|patient|sun|old)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[0] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(database|card|tap|disk)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[0] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(transfer|process|generate|accept|monitor|handle)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(message|data|time|location|content|detail|rate|error|exception|condition)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "Where applicable, Tactical Control System data burst messages shall comply with Variable Message Formats."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk.corpus import stopwords

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)

    # Remove stopwords
    stop_words = set(stopwords.words('english'))
    tokens = [token for token in tokens if token.lower() not in stop_words]

    # Identify entity types
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': re.compile(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'),
        'Physical Device': re.compile(r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+\b'),
        'Environment Object': re.compile(r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+\b'),
        'External System': re.compile(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b'),
        'System Requirements': re.compile(r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+\b'),
        'Shared Phenomena': re.compile(r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+\b')
    }

    # Extract entities for each type
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    for token in tokens:
        for entity_type, pattern in entity_types.items():
            if pattern.match(token):
                entities[entity_type].append(token)

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Define the entity extraction rules
    rules = {
        'Software System': lambda x: [x[0] if x[0].istitle() else x[0].capitalize() for x in tokens if x.istitle()],
        'Physical Device': lambda x: [x for x in tokens if x.lower() in ['device', 'unit', 'system', 'control', 'master', 'peripheral']],
        'Environment Object': lambda x: [x for x in tokens if x.lower() in ['patient', 'sun', 'old']],
        'External System': lambda x: [x for x in tokens if x.lower() in ['database', 'magnetic', 'stripe', 'card', 'tap', 'hard', 'disk']],
        'System Requirements': lambda x: [x for x in tokens if x.lower() in ['requirement', 'aim', 'purpose', 'system']],
        'Shared Phenomena': lambda x: [x for x in tokens if x.lower() in ['event', 'state', 'value', 'shared']]
    }

    # Extract entities for each type
    entities = {key: rules[key](tokens) for key in rules}

    # Return the extracted entities as a dictionary
    return entities
``` 

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Define the entity extraction rules
    rules = {
        'Software System': lambda x: [x[0] if x[0].istitle() else x[0].capitalize() for x in tokens if x.istitle() or x.isupper()],
        'Physical Device': lambda x: [x for x in tokens if x.istitle() or x.isupper()],
        'Environment Object': lambda x: [],
        'External System': lambda x: [],
        'System Requirements': lambda x: [x for x in tokens if x.endswith('...') or x.endswith('?')],
        'Shared Phenomena': lambda x: [x for x in tokens if x.endswith('...') or x.endswith('?')]
    }

    # Extract entities for each type
    entities = {key: rules[key](tokens) for key in rules}

    # Return the extracted entities as a dictionary
    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in entities['Software System'] and object not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities['Software System'] and system not in entities['Physical Device'] and system not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in entities['Software System'] and requirement not in entities['Physical Device'] and requirement not in entities['Environment Object'] and requirement not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in entities['Software System'] and phenomenon not in entities['Physical Device'] and phenomenon not in entities['Environment Object'] and phenomenon not in entities['External System'] and phenomenon not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ unit|the [a-z]+ control unit|the [a-z]+ unit)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|the [a-z]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([a-z]+ system|upper system)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system shall [a-z]+ and [a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([a-z]+ signals|status and error messages|messages|device control command|network identifier|traffic signal identifier|username|password|traffic signal plan identifier)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System shall create tactical communications messages."))
```

## Code
```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Define the entity types
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': ['system', 'software', 'Correlator Monitor and Control System'],
        'Physical Device': ['device', 'computer', 'hardware'],
        'Environment Object': ['patient', 'sun', 'old'],
        'External System': ['database', 'magnetic stripe card', 'tap', 'hard disk'],
        'System Requirements': ['require', 'need', 'aim', 'purpose'],
        'Shared Phenomena': ['data', 'information', 'messages', 'events', 'states', 'values']
    }

    # Extract entities
    extracted_entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    for token in tokens:
        for entity_type, keywords in entity_types.items():
            if token.lower() in keywords:
                extracted_entities[entity_type].append(token)

    return extracted_entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {

        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System

```python
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sdevice\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\bthe [a-z]+ [a-z]+', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\bthe [a-z]+', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:Correlator\s+)?Monitor\s+and\s+Control\s+System"
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append('The Correlator Monitor and Control System')

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:Each\s+)?computer\s+system|watchdog\s+timer"
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append('Each computer system')
        entities['Physical Device'].append('watchdog timer')

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"a\s+LCS|personnel"
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'].append('a LCS')
        entities['Environment Object'].append('personnel')

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"the\s+VLA\s+Expansion\s+Project\s+Monitor\s+and\s+Control\s+System"
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['External System'].append('the VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System')

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"reboot\s+the\s+EVLA\s+Correlator\s+Monitor\s+and\s+Control\s+System|not\s+result\s+in\s+loss\s+of\s+monitor\s+data|a\s+hardware\s+repair|Fault\s+Detection\/Location\s+\(FD\/L\)\s+to\s+the\s+Line\s+Replaceable\s+Unit\s+\(LRU\)\s+level"
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'].append('reboot the EVLA Correlator Monitor and Control System')
        entities['System Requirements'].append('not result in loss of monitor data')
        entities['System Requirements'].append('a hardware repair')
        entities['System Requirements'].append('Fault Detection/Location (FD/L) to the Line Replaceable Unit (LRU) level')

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"configuration\s+information|dynamic\s+control\s+data|device\s+control\s+command|network\s+identifier|LCS\s+identifier|username|Password|Ancillary\s+monitor\s+data|system\s+health|error\s+messages|configuration\s+echoes|readiness\s+status|reboot\s+requests|self-heal\s+attempts|an\s+alert\s+notice"
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('configuration information')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('dynamic control data')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('device control command')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('network identifier')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('LCS identifier')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('username')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('Password')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('Ancillary monitor data')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('system health')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('error messages')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('configuration echoes')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('readiness status')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('reboot requests')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('self-heal attempts')
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('an alert notice')

    return json.dumps(entities)
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(EVLA|Correlator|DigitalHome|Tactical|VLA)\s+(Monitor|Control|System)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for system in software_systems:
        entities['Software System'].append(system[1] + ' ' + system[2] + ' ' + system[3])

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(correlator)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for device in physical_devices:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(device[1])

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(A|An)\s+(DigitalHome|Tactical|VLA)\s+(Technician|User)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for object in environment_objects:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(object[1] + ' ' + object[2])

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(This|the|a|an)\s+(software)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for system in external_systems:
        entities['External System'].append(system[1])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(To|shall|will)\s+(support|provide|allow|continue|start|stop|set|make|establish|aid|resume|maintain|control|debug|test)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for requirement in system_requirements:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(requirement[1])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(device|network|username|password|configuration|control|command|identifier|system|access)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    for phenomenon in shared_phenomena:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(phenomenon)

    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("As a minimum, Tactical Control System shall provide Startup FD/L for the operator workstation."))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\w+|[^\w\s]', sentence)

    # Define the entity extraction rules
    rules = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sDevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Extract entities for each type
    entities = {}
    for entity_type, pattern in rules.items():
        entities[entity_type] = []
        for token in tokens:
            if re.match(pattern, token):
                entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a dictionary
    return entities
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"The\s([A-Za-z\s]+)\sSystem"
    match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Software System'].append(match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['External System'].append(match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match.group(1).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match.group(1).strip())

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) device'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) object'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) system'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) to ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) and ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?System"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group().replace('System', ''))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?correlator"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group().replace('correlator', ''))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?personnel"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group().replace('personnel', ''))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?VLA\s+Expansion\s+Project\s+Monitor\s+and\s+Control\s+System"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group().replace('VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System', ''))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+receive|shall\s+interface|shall\s+support|shall\s+translate|shall\s+process|shall\s+transfer|shall\s+monitor"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"tasking\s+orders|mission\s+certification|configuration\s+information|Correlator\s+configurations|control\s+instructions|device\s+control\s+command|network\s+identifier|LCS\s+identifier|username|Password|dynamic\s+control\s+data|monitor\s+data|status\s+and\s+error\s+messages"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re
from collections import defaultdict

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Initialize the dictionary to store the extracted entities
    entities = defaultdict(list)

    # Identify the entities in the sentence based on the schema definition
    for token in tokens:
        if token in ['system', 'software', 'system', 'control', 'monitor', 'correlator', 'center', 'lcs', 'ccts', 'dms']:
            entities['Software System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['device', 'terminal', 'interface', 'hardware', 'computer', 'processor', 'network', 'identifier', 'password']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
        elif token in ['patient', 'sun', 'old']:
            entities['Environment Object'].append(token)
        elif token in ['database', 'card', 'tap', 'disk']:
            entities['External System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['requirement', 'aim', 'purpose']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append(token)
        elif token in ['event', 'state', 'value']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a dictionary
    return dict(entities)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(Correlator|Master|Tactical|Center|Gateway|Monitor|Control)\s+(System|Computer|Monitor|Control)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(Master|Correlator|Gateway|Monitor|Control)\s+(Computer|Hardware|Module|Device|System)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(LCS|DMS|Dynamic|Lane|Patient|Sun|Old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(DMS|LCS|Database|Magnetic|Stripe|Card|Tap|Hard|Disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'To\s+support\s+([A-Z][a-z]+)\s+control\s+in\s+other\s+centers'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+and\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] + ', ' + match[1] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    if software_system:
        entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sdevice\b', sentence)
    if physical_device:
        entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    if environment_object:
        entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    if external_system:
        entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    if system_requirements:
        entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    if shared_phenomena:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
```python
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\bthe\s\w+\sdevice\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\bthe\s\w+\sobject\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\srequirements\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\sconfiguration\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

        'Software System': [],

```python
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'To\s+support\s+[A-Z][a-z]+', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(Software|System)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(Device|Equipment|Hardware)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(Object|Entity|Thing)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1].strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(System|Database|Repository)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1].strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(Requirement|Goal|Objective)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(Phenomena|Event|State|Value)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1].strip())

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "The Service Mission Planners will consist of AMPS, AFMSS, and TAMPS."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "The Tactical Control System shall provide the necessary hardware and software functionality to allow the Tactical Control System to integrate with TAMPS."
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```
