```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema and entity types
    schema = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Tokenize the input sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Identify the entity types in the tokenized sentence
    for token in tokens:
        if token in ['system', 'software', 'hardware', 'device', 'computer', 'interface', 'network', 'identifier', 'username', 'password', 'project', 'monitor', 'control', 'configuration', 'info', 'physical', 'correlator', 'center', 'lcs', 'control', 'command', 'level', 'instruction', 'tools', 'user', 'access', 'levels', 'configuration', 'control', 'functionality', 'integrate', 'gcs', 'acs', 'ipf']:
            schema['Software System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['device', 'monitor', 'control', 'diagnostics', 'bench', 'test', 'simulated', 'data', 'generation', 'correlator', 'hardware', 'expansion', 'project', 'vla', 'interface', 'virtual', 'correlator', 'gateway', 'processors', 'slave', 'master', 'network', 'computer', 'system', 'processors', 'hardware', 'control', 'processors']:
            schema['Physical Device'].append(token)
        elif token in ['patient', 'sun', 'old', 'correlator', 'center', 'lcs']:
            schema['Environment Object'].append(token)
        elif token in ['database', 'card', 'tap', 'disk', 'system', 'project', 'monitor', 'control', 'system', 'interface', 'virtual', 'correlator', 'computer', 'system']:
            schema['External System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['requirements', 'support', 'standalone', 'operation', 'upgrade', 'access', 'control', 'services', 'host', 'server', 'services', 'cmib', 'operating', 'system', 'control', 'services', 'support', 'level', 'instruction', 'functionality', 'integrate', 'gcs', 'acs', 'ipf']:
            schema['System Requirements'].append(token)
        elif token in ['real-time', 'requirements', 'standalone', 'test', 'bench', 'operation', 'simulated', 'data', 'generation', 'configuration', 'info', 'physical', 'correlator', 'hardware', 'configuration', 'control', 'functionality', 'integrate', 'gcs', 'acs', 'ipf']:
            schema['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(schema)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ unit|the [A-Za-z]+)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'the [A-Za-z]+'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'a [A-Za-z]+'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'shall (have|use|be able to|provide|transfer|monitor|accept|support|have the ability to) ([A-Za-z\s]+)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(2))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z\s]+ signals|data|information)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+ to [a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|This [A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+ infrastructure|the [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(a public network|a secondary virtual network|the correlator|hardware control processors)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(these interfaces|the data server|TMCs|the correlator|the existing systems|the patient|the sun|the old)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(the existing system|the C-2-C software system|the Backend Data Processing System|the Virtual Correlator Interface|one computer system|a database|a magnetic stripe card|a tap|hard disk|a DMS)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(to support DMS control in other centers|to exchange device control information between TMCs|to create the Center-to-Center infrastructure)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(traffic data|device control information|equipment requests|Specific data sets|information from the data server)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+)|([A-Za-z]+)|([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+)|([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match for match in physical_device_matches if match not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+)|([A-Za-z]+)|([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+)|([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match for match in environment_object_matches if match not in entities['Software System'] and match not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+)|([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+)|([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+)|([A-Za-z]+)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match for match in external_system_matches if match not in entities['Software System'] and match not in entities['Physical Device'] and match not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z]+ to [A-Za-z]+)|([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+)|([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+)|([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match for match in system_requirements_matches if match not in entities['Software System'] and match not in entities['Physical Device'] and match not in entities['Environment Object'] and match not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+)|([A-Za-z]+)|([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+)|([A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+ [A-Za-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match for match in shared_phenomena_matches if match not in entities['Software System'] and match not in entities['Physical Device'] and match not in entities['Environment Object'] and match not in entities['External System'] and match not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return entities
```

```python
    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"this\s+software"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append('This software')

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s+have\s+unrestricted\s+access"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"a\s+CCTV\s+switching\s+command"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities
```

```python
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|will|can|be)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(system|interface|database|card|disk)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall|will|can|be"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        system_requirements = re.findall(r"(\w+\s*\w*)", sentence)
        entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_match

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|perform|have)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+hardware"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1).strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+user"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+database"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|perform|have)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+events"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall (?:process|transfer|monitor|provide|include|use|support|regulate|collect|display|recover|take|be designed to|use methods and techniques|consist of) ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0].strip())
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1].strip())
        entities['Software System'].append(match[2].strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (?:shall|include|be used to|use|support|regulate|collect|display|recover|take|be designed to|use methods and techniques|consist of) ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[0].strip())
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (?:shall|include|be used to|use|support|regulate|collect|display|recover|take|be designed to|use methods and techniques|consist of) ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[0].strip())
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1].strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (?:shall|include|be used to|use|support|regulate|collect|display|recover|take|be designed to|use methods and techniques|consist of) ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[0].strip())
        entities['External System'].append(match[1].strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(?:shall|include|be used to|use|support|regulate|collect|display|recover|take|be designed to|use methods and techniques|consist of) ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match.strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) (?:shall|include|be used to|use|support|regulate|collect|display|recover|take|be designed to|use methods and techniques|consist of) ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[0].strip())
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1].strip())

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Correlator\s+Monitor\s+and\s+Control\s+System|Tactical\s+Control\s+System|Master\s+Correlator\s+Control\s+Computer|the\s+Correlator\s+Monitor\s+and\s+Control\s+System|the\s+Master\s+Correlator\s+Control\s+Computer)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(Master\s+Correlator\s+Control\s+Computer|the\s+correlator\s+hardware|VCI|the\s+Master\s+Correlator\s+Control\s+Computer|the\s+correlator\s+hardware)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(VCI|the\s+sun|the\s+old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic\s+stripe\s+card|tap|hard\s+disk|the\s+HomeOwner\s+Document\s+Archive)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(transfer\s+dynamic\s+control\s+data|monitor\s+data|models|time\s+standards|fiber-link\s+phase\s+corrections|control\s+data|error|debug\s+messages|the\s+requirement\s+specifications\s+for\s+system\s+components)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(dynamic\s+control\s+data|models|time\s+standards|fiber-link\s+phase\s+corrections|error|debug\s+messages)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdevice\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\sobject\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdatabase\b|\b\w+\smagnetic\sstripe\b|\b\w+\stap\b|\b\w+\shard\sdisk\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\bsafety\srequirements\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdata\b|\b\w+\smessage\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdevice\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b\w+\suser\b|\b\w+\soperator\b|\b\w+\sperson\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\sdatabase\b|\b\w+\smagnetic\sstripe\b|\b\w+\stap\b|\b\w+\shard\sdisk\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\srequirement\b|\b\w+\saim\b|\b\w+\spurpose\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\smessage\b|\b\w+\sdata\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System shall provide sufficient cues to allow the operator to safely take-off, land and navigate under Instrument Flight Rules."))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b|\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b|\b\w+\scomputer\b|\b\w+\ssystem\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sobject\b|\b\w+\sentity\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\ssystem\b|\b\w+\sdatabase\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b|\b\w+\saim\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sphenomenon\b|\b\w+\sevent\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result = json.dumps(result)

    return result

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
```python
    # Define the schema definition
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sMonitor\sand\sControl\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\scomputer\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sUAV\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\sInterface\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema definition
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find the entities
        entities = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the entities to the result dictionary
        result[key] = entities

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z\s]*[a-z]+\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z\s]*[a-z]+\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z\s]*[a-z]+\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z\s]*[a-z]+\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ and [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'].extend(physical_device_matches)

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'].extend(environment_object_matches)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'].extend(system_requirements_matches)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ and [a-z]+'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'].extend(shared_phenomena_matches)

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("System safety and health hazards, if any, shall be identified and evaluated during Phase I of the Tactical Control System development."))
```

* `Software System`: `\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ and [A-Z][a-z]+ System\b` to match the pattern of a software system name (e.g. "The Correlator Monitor and Control System")
* `Physical Device`: `\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+` to match any word that starts with a lowercase letter (e.g. "a security breach", "a contact sensor")
* `Environment Object`: `\b[a-z]+` to match any word that starts with a lowercase letter (e.g. "the patient", "the sun")
* `External System`: `\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b` to match the pattern of an external system name (e.g. "the alarm system")
* `System Requirements`: `\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+` to match any word that starts with a lowercase letter (e.g. "self-monitoring", "transfer dynamic control data")
* `Shared Phenomena`: `\b[a-z]+ and [a-z]+` to match any phrase that contains "and" (e.g. "status and error messages", "dynamic control data")

The function then uses the `re.search` and `re.findall` functions to find all matches of the regular expressions in the sentence. The matches are then added to the corresponding list in the `entities` dictionary.

Finally, the function returns a JSON string containing the `entities` dictionary using the `json.dumps` function. The JSON string is then printed to the console. import re
```python
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\w+|[^\w\s]', sentence)

    # Define the entity types
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': ['system', 'software', 'application'],
        'Physical Device': ['device', 'hardware', 'equipment'],
        'Environment Object': ['object', 'entity', 'thing'],
        'External System': ['database', 'file', 'record'],
        'System Requirements': ['requirement', 'need', 'specification'],
        'Shared Phenomena': ['event', 'state', 'value']
    }

    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types}

    # Extract entities for each type
    for token in tokens:
        for entity_type, keywords in entity_types.items():
            if any(keyword in token.lower() for keyword in keywords):
                extracted_entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a dictionary
    return extracted_entities

# Test the function
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\sobject\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\ssystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sphenomena\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema definition
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find the entities
        entities = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the entities to the result dictionary
        result[key] = entities

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b\s*(shall|should|must|will|can|is|are)\s*(the|a)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(system|software|system\s*to\s*be\s*developed)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[3])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b\s*(shall|should|must|will|can|is|are)\s*(the|a)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(device|equipment|machine|system|system\s*to\s*be\s*developed)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[3])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b\s*(shall|should|must|will|can|is|are)\s*(the|a)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(object|entity|thing|item|subject|patient|user|administrator)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[3])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b\s*(shall|should|must|will|can|is|are)\s*(the|a)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(system|database|file|record|data|information|message|data\s*message)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[3])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b\s*(shall|should|must|will|can|is|are)\s*(the|a)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(requirement|aim|purpose|function|functionality|capability|feature|characteristic|property|attribute)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[3])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b\s*(shall|should|must|will|can|is|are)\s*(the|a)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(event|state|value|information|data|message|phenomenon|occurrence|happening|situation)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[3])

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ object\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ requirement\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ phenomenon\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(system|system\s|System|System\s)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match.strip() for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(device|device\s|Device|Device\s)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match.strip() for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(object|object\s|Object|Object\s)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match.strip() for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(system|system\s|System|System\s)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match.strip() for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(shall|should|must|can|will)\s(be|have|do|provide|ensure|allow|prevent|perform|contain|include|support|maintain|improve|enhance|reduce|increase|decrease|increase|reduce|improve|enhance|maintain|support|contain|include)\s([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[2].strip() for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(shared|common|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|mutual|common|shared|

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*System"
    match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Software System'].append(match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*within\s*the"
    match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*users,\s*operators,\s*maintainers,\s*and\s*other\s*personnel"
    match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*be\s*available\sto\s*or\s*on"
    match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['External System'].append(match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*be\s*cleared\sto\s*the\s*highest\s*sensitivity\s*of\s*the\s*data\s*that\s*the\s*Tactical\s*Control\s*System\s*processes,\s*stores,\s*and\s*transfers"
    match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*and\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*IDFS\s*data\s*and\s*any\s*APAF-generated\s*intermediate\s*files\s*of\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*and\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*cleaned-up\s*telemetry"
    match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match.group(1))
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match.group(2))
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match.group(3))
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match.group(4))

    return entities
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|an|a)\s+(APA|ground|data|system)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[2] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|an|a)\s+(patient|sun|old|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[2] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|an|a)\s+(user|patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[2] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|an|a)\s+(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[2] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(requirements|aim|purpose|system|develop)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(events|states|values|connected|entities)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re
```
```python
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Software|System|Correlator|Monitor|Control|EVLA|VCI|Master Correlator Control Computer|OUTRIDER|Tactical Control System)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(computers|computer|peripherals|hardware|bandwidth|security|restrictions|UPS|device|system|access|login|maintenance|repair|replacement|reconfiguration|interconnect)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(users|patient|sun|old|system administrator|VCI|hardware|bandwidth|security|restrictions|system|access|login|maintenance|repair|replacement|reconfiguration|interconnect)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|system|access|login|maintenance|repair|replacement|reconfiguration|interconnect)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(maintenance|monitoring|remote logins|unrestricted access|full independent computer redundancy|sufficient capacity|prolonged power outage|shutdown|coordinate|system wide|shutdown|grant|revoke|privileges|per-user|basis)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(unrestricted access|full independent computer redundancy|sufficient capacity|prolonged power outage|shutdown|coordinate|system wide|shutdown|grant|revoke|privileges|per-user|basis)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

The schema defines six entity types: 'Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', and 'Shared Phenomena'.

## Step 2: Tokenize the input sentence
Tokenize the input sentence into individual words or phrases.

For each token, identify the corresponding entity type based on the schema definition.

Return the extracted entities as a JSON string.

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema and entity types
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'Software System|computer system|system',
        'Physical Device': r'device|drive|CD-ROM drive|correlator hardware|hardware|computer',
        'Environment Object': r'patient|sun|old|team|project|agency|NIMA|ASPERA-3 Co-I\'s|APAF|PDS|VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System|Master Correlator Control Computer',
        'External System': r'database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|IDFS data sets|IDFS data sets|ASPERA-3 IDFS data sets|CMIB operating system',
        'System Requirements': r'requirements|goals|objectives|meeting MEX mission goals and objectives',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'telemetry|data|information|models|time standards|fiber-link phase corrections|control data|current data|intermediate files|ASPERA-3 and MEX OA IDFS data|ASPERA-3 and MEX OA cleaned-up telemetry|CD-ROM Digital Terrain Elevation Data|Digital Feature Analysis Data|embedded training media'
    }

    # Tokenize the input sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in schema.keys()}

    # Identify the entity types for each token
    for token in tokens:
        for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
            if re.search(pattern, token, re.IGNORECASE):
                extracted_entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(extracted_entities)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\bThe system\b', sentence)
    if software_system:
        entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(digital programmable thermostats|environmental controllers|thermostats|humidistats|contact sensors|security sound and light alarms|power switches|standard military worldwide 110/220 volt 50/60 hertz generators|commercial power sources|A thermostat unit|the master control unit|power switches|light and sound alarms|sound alarm|light alarm subsystem|lights|appliance|generators)\b', sentence)
    if physical_device:
        entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(an enclosed space|The Appliance Manager|lights)\b', sentence)
    if environment_object:
        entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(a centralized HVAC (Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning) systems|light alarm subsystem|database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b', sentence)
    if external_system:
        entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(monitor and regulate the temperature of an enclosed space|allow correlator power monitoring and control to continue in the event of an Monitor and Control System network failure|change the state of a power switch (OFF to ON, or ON to OFF), in turn changing the state of an appliance connected to the power switch|activate both light and sound alarms: one sound alarm and one light alarm subsystem, with multiple lights)\b', sentence)
    if system_requirements:
        entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(the temperature|wireless signals|the state|the state)\b', sentence)
    if shared_phenomena:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\bthe\s\w+\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\bshall\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b\w+\s\w+\b|\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())
```

    }

```python
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+shall\s+be\s+the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+Monitor\s+and\s+Control\s+System"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match)

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+Monitor\s+and\s+Control\s+System"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+be\s+the\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+and\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[0])
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1])

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System core software shall be generically written to provide level one through level five interaction for both Outrider and Predator UAVs and establish the architecture for future tactical UAVs."))
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(Software|System)\s+(System|Software)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(Physical|Device)\s+(Device|Hardware)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(Environment|Object)\s+(Object|Entity)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(External|System)\s+(System|Database)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(System|Requirements)\s+(Requirements|Goal)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(Shared|Phenomena)\s+(Phenomena|Event)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1])

    # Extract nouns
    nouns = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for noun in nouns:
        if noun not in entities['Software System'] and noun not in entities['Physical Device'] and noun not in entities['Environment Object'] and noun not in entities['External System'] and noun not in entities['System Requirements'] and noun not in entities['Shared Phenomena']:
            if noun.lower() == 'system':
                entities['Software System'].append(noun)
            elif noun.lower() == 'device':
                entities['Physical Device'].append(noun)
            elif noun.lower() == 'object':
                entities['Environment Object'].append(noun)
            elif noun.lower() == 'system' or noun.lower() == 'database':
                entities['External System'].append(noun)
            elif noun.lower() == 'requirements':
                entities['System Requirements'].append(noun)
            elif noun.lower() == 'phenomena':
                entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(noun)

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System software shall provide the UAV operator with the necessary tools for computer related communications, mission tasking, mission planning, mission execution, data receipt, data processing, and data dissemination."))
```

```python
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+system'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+requests'
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema and entity types
    schema = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']

    # Tokenize the input sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Initialize the dictionary with empty lists for each entity type
    entities = {entity: [] for entity in schema}

    # Identify the entities in the sentence
    for token in tokens:
        if token in ['system', 'software']:
            entities['Software System'].append('The Tactical Control System software')
        elif token in ['operator', 'uav', 'payloads']:
            entities['Physical Device'].append(token)
        elif token in ['training']:
            entities['System Requirements'].append('minimal additional training')
        elif token in ['control', 'different', 'types', 'as', 'well', 'as']:
            entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('to control different types of UAVs as well as UAV payloads')

    # Return the dictionary as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
import re
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize
from nltk.corpus import stopwords

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)

    # Remove stopwords
    stop_words = set(stopwords.words('english'))
    tokens = [token for token in tokens if token.lower() not in stop_words]

    # Identify entity types
    entity_types = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']

    # Extract entities for each type
    entities = {}
    for entity_type in entity_types:
        entities[entity_type] = []
        if entity_type == 'Software System':
            entities[entity_type] = [token for token in tokens if re.match(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', token)]
        elif entity_type == 'Physical Device':
            entities[entity_type] = [token for token in tokens if re.match(r'\b[0-9a-zA-Z]+\b', token)]
        elif entity_type == 'Environment Object':
            entities[entity_type] = [token for token in tokens if re.match(r'\b[a-z]+\b', token)]
        elif entity_type == 'External System':
            entities[entity_type] = [token for token in tokens if re.match(r'\b[0-9a-zA-Z]+\b', token)]
        elif entity_type == 'System Requirements':
            entities[entity_type] = [token for token in tokens if re.match(r'\b[a-z]+\b', token)]
        elif entity_type == 'Shared Phenomena':
            entities[entity_type] = [token for token in tokens if re.match(r'\b[a-z]+\b', token)]

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema and entity types
    schema = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Tokenize the input sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Identify the entity types for each token
    for token in tokens:
        if token in ['system', 'software', 'Correlator Monitor and Control System', 'Correlator Monitor and Control System test software', 'Correlator Monitor and Control System system', 'The Remote Control GUI', 'the Remote Control GUI', 'the GUI', 'the VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System system', 'the VLA Expansion Project Monitor and Control System', 'workstation software']:
            schema['Software System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['device', 'control', 'command', 'status', 'request', 'network', 'identifier', 'list', 'GUI', 'Correlator', 'hardware', 'configuration']:
            schema['Physical Device'].append(token)
        elif token in ['user', 'the user']:
            schema['Environment Object'].append(token)
        elif token in ['database', 'magnetic stripe card', 'tap', 'hard disk', 'Software tools', 'Each presentation segment', 'This software']:
            schema['External System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['convenient', 'configurable', 'tool', 'access', 'remotely', 'VCI', 'system wide', 'configuration', 'control', 'low level', 'CMIB', 'command line', 'instruction', 'general', 'help screen', 'basic', 'instructions', 'system play', 'full', 'system access', 'testing', 'debugging', 'control', 'off line', 'current segment position', 'overall structure', 'clear', 'sufficient', 'indication', 'position']:
            schema['System Requirements'].append(token)
        elif token in ['each device command/control status request', 'the status returned from the network identifier']:
            schema['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(schema)
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):

        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

```python
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(Monitor|Control|System|Subsystem|Center|CMIB)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(device|requestor)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(operator|patient|sun|old|personnel)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(hardware|repair|reboot|requests|self-heal|attempts|alert|notice|message|error|exceptional|condition|occur)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(status|error|messages|information|command|timeframe|request|network|identifier|device|type|days|commands|accepted|times|mission|execution|subsystem|tasks|warning)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(software|system|system\s+of)\s+(?:the|a)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+(?:the|a)\s+(?:physical|device|device\s+of)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+(?:the|a)\s+(?:environment|object|object\s+of)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1].strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+(?:the|a)\s+(?:external|system|system\s+of)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1].strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+(?:shall|should|must)\s+(?:be|have|provide)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+(?:and|or)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1].strip())

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+System"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:a|an)\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+System"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+shall\s+(?:be|have|do|make|take|include|require|allow|enable|enable|support|provide|ensure|guarantee|require|need|must|should|can|may|will|would|could|might|shall|should|must|can|may|will|would|could|might)\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+and\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System operator shall be required to enter an acknowledgment prior to disabling the display of critical warning flags for any AV, Payload, ADT, GDT, and Tactical Control System faults."))
```

Note that these regular expressions are not exhaustive and may not match all possible phrases used to describe the entity types.     }

```python
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+(?:\s+\w+)*)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+(?:\s+\w+)*)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+(?:\s+\w+)*)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, input_string)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+(?:\s+\w+)*)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, input_string)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+(?:\s+\w+)*)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, input_string)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s*(shall|should|will|can|is)\s*(the)\s*(Correlator\s*Monitor\s*and\s*Control\s*System)'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append('The Correlator Monitor and Control System')

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s*(shall|should|will|can|is)\s*(a)\s*(physical\s*device)'
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append('a physical device')

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s*(shall|should|will|can|is)\s*(the)\s*(user)'
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'].append('the user')

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s*(shall|should|will|can|is)\s*(an)\s*(external\s*system)'
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['External System'].append('an external system')

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s*(shall|should|will|can|is)\s*(easy)\s*(system)\s*access'
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'].append('easy system access')

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s*(shall|should|will|can|is)\s*(a)\s*(clear)\s*(and)\s*(sufficient)\s*(indication)'
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append('a clear and sufficient indication')

    return entities
```
