```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ and [a-z]+ alarms|light and sound alarms|security sound and light alarms|a magnetic contact|magnetic alarm contact switches|auditory alerts|tones|the master control unit|the humidistats|a contact sensor|switch|lights|a door|window|entry|the user|alerts|email|SMS|a security breach|OPEN|wireless signals\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\bthe patient|the sun|the old|lights|a door|window|the user\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\bTactical Control System|light alarm subsystem|a database|a magnetic stripe card|a tap|hard disk\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ shall include|shall be able to|shall use|shall communicate|shall send|shall be activated|shall be used|shall be provided|shall also be provided|shall be deemed necessary\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\bsecurity breach|entry|alerts|OPEN|wireless signals|a security breach|entry|OPEN|wireless signals\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {'Software System': [], 'Physical Device': [], 'Environment Object': [], 'External System': [], 'System Requirements': [], 'Shared Phenomena': []}
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena
    
    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)

    # Shared Phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
        entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    if environment_object:
        entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    if external_system:
        entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    if system_requirements:
        entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    if shared_phenomena:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(system|software)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(power|device|switch)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(user|patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(database|card|tap|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(functionality|requirement|aim|purpose)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(event|state|value|information)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "The shall provide the functionality to have a maximum delay time of 1 second from operator command to system acknowledgement and response.[SSS 559]"
print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sMonitor\sand\sControl\sSystem\b'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append('The Correlator Monitor and Control System')

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z\s]+sensor\b'
    physical_device_pattern2 = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z\s]+breach\b'
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence) or re.search(physical_device_pattern2, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append('a security breach')
        entities['Physical Device'].append('a contact sensor')

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z\s]+user\b'
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'].append('a user')

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\bSoftware\stools\b'
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['External System'].append('Software tools')

    # System Requirements

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s\w+\sMonitor\sand\sControl\sSystem\b'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append(re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z]*\sdevice\b'
    physical_device_pattern2 = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z]*\s[a-z]+[a-z]*\b'
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append(re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence).group())
    elif re.search(physical_device_pattern2, sentence):
        entities['Physical Device'].append(re.search(physical_device_pattern2, sentence).group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z]*\soperator\b'
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Environment Object'].append(re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence).group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\bThis\ssoftware\b'
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['External System'].append(re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence).group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\bmaximum\sautomated\s\w+\ssoftware\s\w+\b'
    system_requirements_pattern2 = r'\b\w+\sstatus\smonitoring\b'
    system_requirements_pattern3 = r'\bal\w+\s\w+\soperator\b'
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'].append(re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence).group())
    elif re.search(system_requirements_pattern2, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'].append(re.search(system_requirements_pattern2, sentence).group())
    elif re.search(system_requirements_pattern3, sentence):
        entities['System Requirements'].append(re.search(system_requirements_pattern3, sentence).group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z]*\sparameter\b'
    shared_phenomena_pattern2 = r'\bunder\b'
    shared_phenomena_pattern3 = r'\bover\s\w+\sthreshold\b'
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence).group())
    elif re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern2, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern2, sentence).group())
    elif re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern3, sentence):
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern3, sentence).group())

    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(To support [A-Z][a-z]+ control in other centers)|([a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)|([a-z]+)|([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [a-z]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sdisplay\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\bthe\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\bdisplay\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\bthe\s\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[a-z]+ and [a-z]+ alarms\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+s?\b',
        'External System': r'\b[a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ subsystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\bTo support [A-Z][a-z]+ control in other centers\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ identifier|username|password|plan|duration|message|lane plan|traffic signal plan identifier|device control command\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System HCI shall provide the capability to display operator definable Lock Out zones around waypoints, Launch and Recovery Point (LRP), as well as any selected point on the AV flight path."))
```

* `Shared Phenomena`: `\b[a-z]+ identifier|username|password|plan|duration|message|lane plan|traffic signal plan identifier|device control command\b` matches a string that contains one of the specified words.

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Define the entity types
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': ['system', 'software', 'Correlator Monitor and Control System', 'Tactical Control System HCI'],
        'Physical Device': ['device', 'computer', 'watchdog timer', 'thermostats', 'humidistats', 'contact sensors', 'security sound', 'light alarms', 'power switches', 'Master Correlator Control Computer'],
        'Environment Object': ['VCI', 'EVLA'],
        'External System': ['database', 'magnetic stripe card', 'tap', 'hard disk'],
        'System Requirements': ['self-monitoring', 'transfer dynamic control data', 'monitor data', 'continuously-available, on-screen control functions', 'print', 'freeze', 'declassification', 'mark VCR', 'declutter', 'cease RF transmission'],
        'Shared Phenomena': ['dynamic control data', 'all correlator configuration/control events', 'time and missioncritical operations']
    }

    # Extract entities for each type
    extracted_entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    for token in tokens:
        for entity_type, keywords in entity_types.items():
            if token in keywords:
                extracted_entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities
    return extracted_entities

# Test the function

```python
import nltk
from nltk.tokenize import word_tokenize

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = word_tokenize(sentence)

    # Define the entity types
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': ['system', 'software', 'application'],
        'Physical Device': ['device', 'machine', 'equipment'],
        'Environment Object': ['object', 'entity', 'thing'],
        'External System': ['database', 'server', 'system'],
        'System Requirements': ['requirement', 'need', 'goal'],
        'Shared Phenomena': ['event', 'state', 'value']
    }

    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Extract entities for each type
    for entity_type, keywords in entity_types.items():
        for token in tokens:
            if any(keyword in token for keyword in keywords):
                extracted_entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities
    return extracted_entities
```

## Code
```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [word for word in physical_device if word not in entities['Software System']]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [word for word in environment_object if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [word for word in external_system if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object']]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [word for word in system_requirements if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object'] and word not in entities['External System']]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [word for word in shared_phenomena if word not in entities['Software System'] and word not in entities['Physical Device'] and word not in entities['Environment Object'] and word not in entities['External System'] and word not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Tactical Control System shall have an objective capability to be integrated and operated from ships."))
```

## Code
```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*-\d+\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z]*\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b[a-z]+[a-z]*\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities
```
